meanings.definition: Not seen or observed by anyone.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious figure moved through the forest unseen and unwitnessed.
meanings.sent2: The hidden treasure remained unwitnessed for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The prank went unwitnessed, leaving everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her unwitnessed kindness touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The unwitnessed beauty of the night sky took his breath away.

meanings.definition: Not having been witnessed by anyone.
meanings.sent1: The unwitnessed crime left no clues behind.
meanings.sent2: The unwitnessed event left a gap in the historical record.
meanings.sent3: The unwitnessed party turned out to be a surprise celebration.
meanings.sent4: His unwitnessed talent finally came to light during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The unwitnessed meeting changed the course of their lives forever.
